complaint.description: Telkom has provided pathetic service. Their call centre staff are robotic and unhelpful. They charge additional fees without explanation, cancel debits without reason, and provide incorrect banking details. There is no supervisor or team leader available for assistance.
complaint.suggestion: Telkom should improve their customer service by training their staff to be more helpful and empathetic. They should also ensure accurate billing and provide better communication with customers.

meta.review_content: Telkom has got to be the worst telecommunications. Their call centre is even worse with the most robotic staff with no emotions. They charge you additional fees with no reason, they then cancel your debit with no reason, then advise you not to pay because the debit might still go off, then suspend your line, then give you wrong banking details and tell you it’s not their problem. There is no supervisor or team leader you can liaise with. The most putrid customer service ever l!!
